name: Syauqi Ilham Alfaraci
bio:
Hello there, my name is Syauqi Ilham Alfaraci, but my friend always call me "cukil" for some reason.

Anyway, I'm really good at making people laugh, I edit video so it looks "funny" enough if you can call it.

I love like, really LOVE travelling (read: riding with my bike). Especially to the beach, well who doesn't love beach right?

And I also pretty good at programming too, somehow lol.

I got 3 years of experience at Android Development, 1 year of experience at C# & WPF Development, and less than 1 year of experience at iOS, and Unreal Engine Development.
address: Jl. Mentor Gg. Hambali 1 No. 96, Gunung Batu, Bandung
